N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.8 - Highway Construction and Maintenance Safety Education Program

State Regulations

The commissioner shall establish a Highway Construction and

Maintenance Safety Education Program. This shall include a comprehensive set of
public education and awareness programs aimed at improving work zone safety. These programs may include public service announcements, media events, websites
or mailings. Funding allocated from surcharges imposed on work zone speed limit
violations should be used to expand these programs. The department shall maintain a list and description of
such programs and shall report on these biennially to the Governor, Temporary

President of the Senate and the Speaker of the Assembly. Notes
